SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS row_number , FR.MOD_TIME,FR.S_VAL,FR.H_VAL,FR.L_VAL,FR.E_VAL , case FG.GOODS_RESULT when 'U' then '상승' when 'D' then '하락' end as GOODS_RESULT , CONCAT(#{type1}, '분 거래') as RTIME FROM fx_goods FG cross join (select @rownum := 0) r INNER JOIN ( SELECT MOD_TIME , SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(S_VAL ORDER BY RT),',',1) AS S_VAL , MAX(H_VAL) AS H_VAL , MIN(L_VAL) AS L_VAL , SUBSTRING_INDEX(GROUP_CONCAT(E_VAL ORDER BY RT DESC),',',1) AS E_VAL FROM ( SELECT RT, S_VAL, H_VAL, L_VAL, E_VAL
, RT AS MOD_TIME
, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%i') MOD 2 = 0 THEN RT WHEN DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%i') MOD 2 = 1 THEN DATE_ADD(RT, INTERVAL -1 MINUTE) END AS MOD_TIME
, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%i') MOD 3 = 0 THEN RT WHEN DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%i') MOD 3 = 1 THEN DATE_ADD(RT, INTERVAL -1 MINUTE) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%i') MOD 3 = 2 THEN DATE_ADD(RT, INTERVAL -2 MINUTE) END MOD_TIME
, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%i') MOD 5 = 0 THEN RT WHEN DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%i') MOD 5 = 1 THEN DATE_ADD(RT, INTERVAL -1 MINUTE) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%i') MOD 5 = 2 THEN DATE_ADD(RT, INTERVAL -2 MINUTE) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%i') MOD 5 = 3 THEN DATE_ADD(RT, INTERVAL -3 MINUTE) WHEN DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%i') MOD 5 = 4 THEN DATE_ADD(RT, INTERVAL -4 MINUTE) END MOD_TIME
FROM fx_result WHERE DATE_FORMAT(RT, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{startDate} ) FR GROUP BY MOD_TIME ) FR ON DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(FG.GOODS_DATE, ' ', FG.GOODS_TIME), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), INTERVAL #{type1} MINUTE) = FR.MOD_TIME WHERE FG.RUN_TIME = #{type1} AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(CONCAT(FG.GOODS_DATE, ' ', FG.GOODS_TIME), INTERVAL #{type1} MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d') = #{startDate} AND FG.GOODS_RESULT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY FG.GOODS_DATE DESC, FG.GOODS_TIME DESC

select count(*) from (SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS row_number,FROM_UNIXTIME(TIMESTAMP / 1000), S_VAL, H_VAL, L_VAL,E_VAL FROM fx_result_sec cross join (select @rownum := 0) r WHERE result_date = CURDATE() and SUBSTRING(result_time,1, 2) = #{type1}) as CNTR

SELECT DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(FR.RT), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), INTERVAL 1 MINUTE) MOD_TIME, FR.E_VAL E_VAL , FG.GOODS_RESULT GOODS_RESULT , CASE FG.GOODS_RESULT WHEN 'U' THEN '매수' WHEN 'D' THEN '매도' WHEN 'T' THEN '무효' ELSE '대기중' END RTIME FROM fx_goods FG LEFT OUTER JOIN fx_result FR ON DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(FG.GOODS_DATE, ' ', FG.GOODS_TIME), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), INTERVAL #{runTime} - 1 MINUTE) = FR.RT WHERE DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(FG.GOODS_DATE, ' ', FG.GOODS_TIME), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'), INTERVAL #{runTime} MINUTE) <= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') AND FG.RUN_TIME = #{runTime} ORDER BY CONCAT(FG.GOODS_DATE, ' ', FG.GOODS_TIME) DESC LIMIT 0, 10;
